text: Out of an Old Man's Head () is a 1968 Swedish comedy drama movie directed by Per Åhlin and Tage Danielsson and starring Hans Alfredson, Karl-Axel Forssberg, Monica Ekman, Gösta Ekman. == Other websites == * Category:1968 comedy-drama movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Per Åhlin Category:Movies directed by Tage Danielsson
title: Out of an Old Man's Head
